env.title: Environment path
env.description:
Absolute path of your ROS binaries.
Keep it empty to use the default one.

master.title: Master launch file
master.description:
Absolute path of your launch file to initialize ROS master.
Keep it empty to use the default one.

workspaces.title: Workspace Paths
workspaces.description:
Absolute paths to the workspaces separated by colons.
Example:
/home/jovyan/ws1:/home/jovyan/w2:/home/jovyan/ws3
Keep it empty to use load the workspaces sourced before jupyter lab was started.
